items.content: My first online course : Mastering CSS animations.

Development of a social network dedicated to athletes.

  • Network registration.
  • Add / Follow another contact.
  • Create pages / groups for a specific sport.
  • Create events for the organization of the parties.
  • Create daily stories.
  • Create / Share posts on the profile or on a page / group.
  • Invitation of contacts to participate in a game.
  • Request to participate in a game.
  • Review the players.
  • Get notified during a game on the same region.
items.techs:
Technical environment :
Angular 8, Bootstrap, jQuery, Laravel 6, Rest Api, Git, WebStorm, PhpStorm, DataGrip, Xampp

items.content:
Development of an agricultural upstream management information system for the COSUMAR group.

The digitalization of the aggregate-aggregate relationship and the automation of agricultural processes.

  • Implementation of REST APIs in BackEnd.
  • Technical support for developers.
  • Improvement of the development environment (Scripting, alias…).
